input: This paper evaluates the impact of the newly proposed Variable Network Adoption Model (VNAM) on the accuracy of predictive data analytics tasks. VNAM is based on a dynamic architecture which can adopt to the underlying data characteristics and can be applied to supervised learning tasks.
output: The article discusses Variable Network Adoption Model (VNAM), a dynamic architecture that is designed to increase accuracy in predictive data analytics tasks. VNAM is able to adjust to the data characteristics and can be applied to supervised learning tasks. The paper conducted an evaluation of the impact of VNAM on the accuracy of predictive data analytics tasks and results showed that VNAM was effective in increasing accuracy.
